screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .xsosd file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
screenshot.caption: XSOSD file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code

description: ProgDVB is a Windows program that allows users to watch digital TV and listen to the radio on their computer. Users can also alter ProgDVB's UI and appearance using custom skins, which are often saved as XSOSD files.

XSOSD files are XML files that are created using ProgDVB's SkinEditor. They contain text that defines the skin's name, the version of ProgDVB the skin is meant to be used with, and the skin's display settings. ProgDVB includes a handful of default XSOSD files, and users can download a variety of additional XSOSD files from the ProgDVB â†’ Skins section of ProgDVB's website.
NOTE: ProgDVB skins also use the .xskin extension.
